summary:
Modifies the Combat-oriented perk-trees. It currently includes Light/Heavy Armor, One-/Two-Handed, Marksman, Block and a little bit of Sneak.
Currently adds more than 20 new perks in total.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Combat-related perks overhaul
Version: 0.0.9
Date: 2/8/2012
Category: Gameplay Effects and Changes
Author(s): Templar-von-Midgard
Forum Thread: http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1344386-relwip-combat-related-perks-overhaul/

[b][color=gold]Description
===========[/color][/b]
Modifies the Combat-oriented perk-trees. It currently includes Light/Heavy Armor, One-/Two-Handed, Marksman, Block and a little bit of Sneak.
Currently adds 20 new perks in total.


[b][color=gold]Recommended
===========[/color][/b]
I recommend the usage of NMM and Wyre Bash, since they can be realy helpful.
I also recommend the of Skyrim -Elys/Community- Uncapper.

[b][color=gold]Details
=======[/color][/b]
Now there is also a version with less ranks to help those not using any perk point extenders!

This is my project to overhaul the Combat related perk-trees in a logical and balanced way.

In details I\'ve tried to make a system, where every skill-tree is unique in its own way, for example if you know how to use an elven armor effectively, you\'ll where it have weak points.
Also I nerfed the perks a little bit, but its just the first look. Just some maths:
You have an iron sword(base damage: [7])
You have the Armsman perk of the 5th grade: vanilla +100% damage, my overhaul: +40% damage
And you have the Sword Expert perk of the 5th grade: vanilla: no perk, my overhaul: +50% damage
So it is vanilla: 7*2=14 versus this system 7*1,4*1,5=14,7

[b][color=green]Current Features:[/color][/b]

[u][b][color=yellow]General:[/color][/b][/u]
-now if you do not wear any armor you can resist magic 10% better

[u][b][color=yellow]One-Handed:[/color][/b][/u]
-Defensive Knowledge: 4 ranks 5% resistance vs one-handed weapons/ranks
-Dagger/Sword/Mace/Battleaxe Expert: each has 5 ranks, each rank increases damage by 10%
-Quick Edge: it makes attacks with daggers 10% faster.
-Armsman: damage bonuses: 1st rank/2nd/3rd/4th/5th -> 8%/15%/23%/30%/40%
-Bladesman perk has one rank and now calculates the critical chance by dividing your skill level by 5.

[u][b][color=yellow]Light Armor:[/color][/b][/u]
-Agile Defender gives +10% AR/rank
-Swiftness: 3 ranks: -10% damage from blunt weapons/rank
-Weak Points: 2 ranks: +15% damage versus Light Armor/rank
-reworked the tree a little bit.

[u][b][color=yellow]Two-Handed:[/color][/b][/u]
-It is similar to my One-Handed skill-tree

[u][b][color=yellow]Heavy Armor:[/color][/b][/u]
-now those wearing heavy armor have a natural weakness of 10% against magic
-Juggernaut now gives +15% armor rating/rank
-Conditioning: Reduced weight reduction to 50% from 100%
-Added Blade Deflection: 3 ranks: -10% damage from blade weapons/rank
-Added Weak Links: 2 ranks: +15% damage against heavy armor wearing opponents/rank

[u][b][color=yellow]Block:[/color][/b][/u]
[b][color=green]Now effective blocking with shields require less perk points and stronger then blocking with weapons![/color][/b]
-Added Parry: 3 ranks: +10% damage blocked by blade weapons/rank
-Added Blunt Parry: 3 ranks: +10% damage blocked by blunt weapons/rank
-Added Light Blocking: 5 ranks: +5% damage blocked with weapons/rank
-Added Heavy Blocking: 5 ranks: +10% damage blocked with shields/rank
-Shield Wall reworked: 1st rank/2nd/3rd/4th/5th -> +10% blocking/+15/+20/+25/+30%
-reworked layout
-Elemental Protection now give Block Skill Level*0.33 resistance.
-Arrow Deflection now have chance equal to your Block Skill Level.

[u][b][color=yellow]Marksman:[/color][/b][/u]
-reworked layout
-Mail Piercer: Arrows ignore 10% or Armor Rating
-Piercing Shot: Arrows cause bleeding damage
-Advanced Knowledge of Arrows: 4 ranks: 5% resistance versus arrows/rank

[u][b][color=yellow]Sneak:[/color][/b][/u]
-Backstab now works on Two-Handed weapons too
-reworked layout

I am open to suggestions.

[b][color=green]Install
=======[/color][/b]
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\
4. Start Oblivion Launcher, click \'Data Files\', place a checkmark beside the .esp file(s).

[b][color=red]Uninstall
=========[/color][/b]
1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click data files, uncheck the .esp file(s).
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

[b][color=red]Uninstall(NMM)
==============[/color][/b]
1. Start NMM, uncheck \"Combat-related perks overhaul\"

[b][color=gold]Upgrade
=======[/color][/b]
Just overwrite the file.

[b][color=red]Incompatibility
===============[/color][/b]
I am unsure, but I think it is incompatible with the other perk expander/overhauler/remover mods.

[b][color=red]Known Issues or Bugs
====================[/color][/b]
I don\'t know about any but please let me know if you have found some bugs.

[b][color=green]History
=======[/color][/b]
[b][color=yellow]V0.0.9:[/color][/b]
Heavy Armor:
-now those wearing heavy armor have a natural weakness of 10% against magic
-Juggernaut now gives +15% armor rating/rank
General:
-now if you do not wear any armor you can resist magic 10% better

[b][color=yellow]V0.0.8:[/color][/b]
Block:
-Elemental Protection now give Block Skill Level*0.33 resistance.
-Arrow Deflection now have chance equal to your Block Skill Level.
Two-Handed:
-Deep Wounds perk has one rank and now calculates the critical chance by dividing your skill level by 5.
One-Handed:
-Bladesman perk has one rank and now calculates the critical chance by dividing your skill level by 5.
Cutthroat -> Quick Edge now makes attacks with daggers 10% faster.

Block:
-added Parry and Blunt Parry
-Light Blocking gives +5%/rank
Heavy Armor:
-Cushioned now enables faster stamina regeneration by 25%

-Backstab now works for Two-Handed weapons too

[b][color=yellow]V0.0.6.1:[/color][/b]
-bugfix

[b][color=yellow]V0.0.6:[/color][/b]

[b][color=yellow]V0.0.5:[/color][/b]

-Base Weapon perks(1/2handed) now increase the damage by 8/15/23/30/40%

[b][color=yellow]V0.0.4:[/color][/b]

-reworked layout
-Mail Piercer: Arrows ignore 10% or Armor Rating
-Piercing Shot: Arrows cause bleeding damage
-Adnvanced Knowledge of Arrows: 4 ranks: 5% resistance versus arrows/rank

-reworked layout

[b][color=yellow]V0.0.3:[/color][/b]
-new perk trees included:

-Added Weak Links: 2 ranks: +15% damage against heavy armor wearing opponents/rank
-Block:
-Added Light Blocking: 5 ranks: +10% damage blocked with weapons/rank
-Added Heavy Blocking: 5 ranks: +10% damage blocked with shields/rank

[b][color=yellow]V0.0.2:[/color][/b]
-1 new perk:
-Defensive Knowledge:
-4 ranks 5% resistance vs one-handed weapons/ranks
-Bugfix
-Cutthroat changed:
-now it increases the sneak damage done by daggers by 50%

[b][color=yellow]v0.0.1:[/color][/b]
-initial release
-6 new perks:
-Dagger/Sword/Mace/Battleaxe Expert:
-each has 5 ranks, each rank increases damage by 10%
-Cutthroat:
-adds a few percents of chance to dod critical damage with a dagger
-Weaponmaster:
-Increases damage done by one-handed weapons by 100%
-1 perk changed:
-Armsman:
-now the ranks have only 10% damage increase
